abstract: Gretchen Morgenson Fair Game column examines push by shareholders of Tempur Sealy International to force mattress maker to oust three of its top executives, including chief executive Mark A Sarvary; observes that effort has been led H Partners, low-profile investment firm that revealed itself as company's largest shareholder.
lead_paragraph: When investors in the mattress maker convene next month, they will decide whether three top officials, including the chief executive, should be ousted.

headline.main: Tempur Sealy Shareholder Clamors to Shake Up an Entrenched Board
headline.print_headline: Clamoring for a Seat at the Table

snippet: When investors in the mattress maker convene next month, they will decide whether three top officials, including the chief executive, should be ousted.
